description: This is a FastAPI-based backend server implementation for a career platform, including route definitions, in-memory data models, authentication, job listings, and user profile management.

classes.name: _InMemoryStore
classes.description: In-memory data storage for users, sessions, profiles, and jobs.

classes.name: HealthResponse
classes.description: Response model for health check endpoint.

classes.name: AuthLoginRequest
classes.description: Request model for login endpoint containing email and password.

classes.name: AuthLoginResponse
classes.description: Response model for login endpoint containing token info.

classes.name: User
classes.description: User data model with id and email.

classes.name: UserProfile
classes.description: User profile data model including full name, headline, skills, etc.

classes.name: JobBase
classes.description: Base model for job listings with common fields.

classes.name: JobCreate
classes.description: Model for creating a new job listing.

classes.name: Job
classes.description: Complete job listing model including id and creation timestamp.

classes.name: JobsListResponse
classes.description: Response model for listing multiple jobs with pagination.

classes.name: ProfileUpdateRequest
classes.description: Model for updating user profile fields.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Creates and configures the FastAPI application with routes, middleware, and in-memory data.

methods.name: health_check
methods.description: Health check endpoint to verify service availability.

methods.name: auth_login
methods.description: Authenticates user and issues a session token.

methods.name: auth_logout
methods.description: Invalidates the current user session token.

methods.name: list_jobs
methods.description: Lists available job postings with optional filtering and pagination.

methods.name: get_job
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific job by ID.

methods.name: create_job
methods.description: Creates a new job posting (requires authentication).

methods.name: get_my_profile
methods.description: Retrieves the current user's profile, creating a default if missing.

methods.name: update_my_profile
methods.description: Updates the current user's profile with provided data.
